news_header: Hamas handed over four coffins to the Red Cross, claiming they contain bodies of Israeli hostages.
news_original_title: Hamas luovutti Israelille neljä hauta-arkkua – sisällä väitetysti panttivankien ruumiit
news_text: Hamas delivered four burial coffins to the Red Cross in Gaza, claiming they hold the bodies of four Israeli hostages, including a mother and her children. This act is part of a cease-fire agreement with Israel, and the coffins will be examined in Israel. Hamas is expected to release six live hostages next.
